events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under Refund based on customer's request mentioning refund and wrong item.
A customer service agent specializing in refunds has been assigned to handle this case.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I'm here to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received versus what you expected?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I have attached pictures showing the item I got, which is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. I have processed a full refund to your original payment method. You should see it within 5 business days.
Thanks for handling this quickly! I appreciate the prompt refund. Have a great day.
The refund has been successfully processed and the customer confirmed satisfaction with the resolution.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can help with.
Since the refund was processed and no further issues reported, we are closing this case now.
